description: 80+ line meeting discussion with status updates, feedback review, hiring talk, and 3 concrete action items scheduled at the end: quarterly planning offsite, sprint demo, and tech debt review.

events.title: Quarterly Planning Offsite
events.reasoning: Alice explicitly asks everyone to block off Wednesday March 4th from 1 to 4 PM for the quarterly planning offsite at the Riverside Conference Center. All attendees confirm.

events.title: Sprint Demo
events.reasoning: Alice asks Bob to schedule a sprint demo for this Friday at 2 PM to show stakeholders the sprint's work. Bob agrees to book the all-hands room.

events.title: Tech Debt Review
events.reasoning: Alice asks Carol to set up a tech debt review session for next Tuesday at 11 AM, 90 minutes long, with the full engineering team.

mock_llm_response.summary: Found 3 action items from the Q1 product review meeting: quarterly planning offsite (March 4, 1-4 PM), sprint demo (this Friday at 2 PM), and tech debt review (next Tuesday at 11 AM for 90 minutes).

notes: Reference datetime is Friday 2026-02-20, so 'this Friday' is 2026-02-27, 'next Tuesday' is 2026-02-24, and 'Wednesday March 4th' is 2026-03-04. The meeting has extensive discussion but only 3 concrete scheduling actions at the end. Moderate tolerance since the events are explicitly stated with clear times.
